verses.verse: But <WG1161> know <WG1097> this <WG5124>, that <WG3754> in <WG1722> the last <WG2078> days <WG2250> grievous <WG5467> times <WG2540> shall come <WG1764>.

For <WG1063> men <WG444> shall be <WG2071> lovers of self <WG5367>, lovers of money <WG5366>, boastful <WG213>, haughty <WG5244>, railers <WG989>, disobedient <WG545> to parents <WG1118>, unthankful <WG884>, unholy <WG462>,
without natural affection <WG794>, implacable <WG786>, slanderers <WG1228>, without self-control <WG193>, fierce <WG434>, no lovers of good <WG865>,
traitors <WG4273>, headstrong <WG4312>, puffed <WG5187> up <WG5369>, lovers of pleasure rather <WG3123> than <WG2228> lovers of God <WG5377>;
holding <WG2192> a form <WG3446> of godliness <WG2150>, but <WG1161> having denied <WG720> the power <WG1411> thereof <WG846>: from <WG665> these <WG5128> also turn away <WG665>.

For <WG1063> of <WG1537> these <WG5130> are <WG1526> they that creep <WG1744> into <WG1519> houses <WG3614>, and <WG2532> take captive <WG162> silly women <WG1133> laden <WG4987> with sins <WG266>, led away <WG71> by divers <WG4164> lusts <WG1939>,
ever <WG3842> learning <WG3129>, and <WG2532> never <WG3368> able <WG1410> to come <WG2064> to <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of the truth <WG225>.

And <WG1161> even as <WG5158> Jannes <WG2389> and <WG2532> Jambres <WG2387> withstood <WG436> Moses <WG3475>, so <WG3779> do <WG436> these <WG3778> also <WG2532> withstand <WG436> the truth <WG225>. Men <WG444> corrupted <WG2704> in mind <WG3563>, reprobate <WG96> concerning <WG4012> the faith <WG4102>.

But <WG235> they shall proceed <WG4298> no <WG3756> further <WG4119>. For <WG1063> their <WG846> folly <WG454> shall be <WG2071> evident <WG1552> unto all <WG3956> men <WG5613>, as theirs <WG1565> also <WG2532> came to be <WG1096>.
But <WG1161> thou <WG4771> didst follow <WG3877> my <WG3450> teaching <WG1319>, conduct <WG72>, purpose <WG4286>, faith <WG4102>, longsuffering <WG3115>, love <WG26>, patience <WG5281>,

persecutions <WG1375>, sufferings <WG3804>. What <WG3634> things befell <WG1096> me <WG3427> at <WG1722> Antioch <WG490>, at <WG1722> Iconium <WG2430>, at <WG1722> Lystra <WG3082>; what <WG3634> persecutions <WG1375> I endured <WG5297>. And <WG2532> out of <WG1537> them all <WG3956> the Lord <WG2962> delivered <WG4506> me <WG3165>.
Yea <WG1161>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> that would <WG2309> live <WG2198> godly <WG2153> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> shall suffer persecution <WG1377>.
But <WG1161> evil <WG4190> men <WG444> and <WG2532> impostors <WG1114> shall wax <WG4298> worse and worse <WG5501>, deceiving <WG4105> and <WG2532> being deceived <WG4105>.

But <WG1161> abide <WG3306> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> the things which <WG3739> thou hast learned <WG3129> and <WG2532> hast been assured of <WG4104>, knowing <WG1492> of <WG3844> whom <WG5101> thou hast learned them <WG3129>.

And <WG2532> that <WG3754> from <WG575> a babe <WG1025> thou hast known <WG1492> the sacred <WG2413> writings <WG1121> which are able <WG1410> to make <WG4679> thee <WG4571> wise <WG4679> unto <WG1519> salvation <WG4991> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Every <WG3956> scripture <WG1124> inspired of God <WG2315> is also <WG2532> profitable <WG5624> for <WG4314> teaching <WG1319>, for <WG4314> reproof <WG1650>, for <WG4314> correction <WG1882>, for <WG4314> instruction <WG3809> which is in <WG1722> righteousness <WG1343>.
That <WG2443> the man <WG444> of God <WG2316> may be <WG5600> complete <WG739>, furnished <WG1822> completely unto <WG4314> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>.
